attributes.action: Make it illegal to wake up when it's still dark.
attributes.background: It's very unnatural to wake up when it is still dark and now winter is coming in the UK, the safety and sanity of the public should be at the up most importance to the UK government! Help prevent people from becoming SAD and make it illegal for all UK residents to wake up whilst its still dark.

rejection.details:
We're not quite sure what you mean. It would be very difficult for Parliament to pass a law about the time that people should wake up. 

If you mean that people shouldn't be required to be awake before it is light, for example because of school or work timetables, and you would like to change the way that we set the time during the winter to achieve this, you could start a petition specifically about that.
